definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

sentences.english: Portuguese Araujo finished ninth overall when the WRC last visited Greece.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄牙人阿羅約在上屆希臘站中獲得了全場第九名。

sentences.english: 'The president is outraged and has ordered an impartial investigation, ' Mr. Remonde said.
sentences.chinese: 雷蒙迪說，阿羅約總統痛斥暴行，下令徹查。

sentences.english: And just now, I met with President Anaya of the Permanent Commission and President Arroyo of the Chamber of Deputies.
sentences.chinese: 剛纔，我又會見了安納亞主席和阿羅約衆議長。

sentences.english: Her allies want to change the system of government from presidential to parliamentary.
sentences.chinese: 阿羅約的盟友要求改變政府制度從總統制改爲議會制。

sentences.english: Accompanied by Arroyo, Hu Jintao paraded the honor guard of the Philippines.
sentences.chinese: 胡錦濤在阿羅約陪同下檢閱了菲律賓儀仗隊。

sentences.english: Arroyo expressed that President Hu's suggestions are of keen insight.
sentences.chinese: 阿羅約表示，胡主席提出的建議很有見地。
